data.question: What is the empirical formula of the crystal studied?
What crystal system does the studied crystal belong to?
What is the space group of the crystal?
What temperature were the data collected at?
What was the maximum 2θ value used in the data collection?
What method was used for the structure solution?
What was the final R value after refinement?
What was the calculated density of the crystal?
True or False: An empirical absorption correction was applied.
True or False: The crystal color is described as black.
True or False: The crystal system is cubic.
True or False: The space group number is 148.
True or False: The crystal was mounted in a glass capillary for measurement.
True or False: The final cycle of refinement was based on 1435 observed reflections.
